title: GAX Constraint Validation Engine Configuration
description: Maps declarative fields and operators from AxiomaticPolicyConstraintSchema to internal system state and execution functions.

stateVectorMap.description: Mapping declarative rule fields (e.g., 'Target.Scope') to actual runtime state paths/getters.

operatorFunctions.description: Defines the executable function reference (e.g., 'lib_runtime/compare.fn_eq') for each recognized operator.

scopeLoadOptimization.description: Configuration for efficiently loading constraints based on execution scope defined in APCS.
